name: Mighty Torch
description:
MASTER YOUR REFLEXES AND CONCENTRATION!

Meet Tyna!
She is a mechanic that is going to need your help with the components she needs.

FEEL THE MAGIC OF BUILDING YOUR OWN ELECTRONICS!
Help Tyna finish her job at a fast pace and unlock her true potential by getting max level for all her torches. Match and give Tyna the component colors that she asks in sequence.

FEATURES :
- Fast-paced reaction based gameplay
- Train your hand-eye coordination
- 3 different game modes with daily rewards
- 4 unique game changing torches
- 5 skills to mix and match and suit to your playstyle
- Mods that help you and Tyna get maximum scores
- Collect points to unlock and upgrade skills!

Like us! : https://www.facebook.com/Star-Seeker-Games-139189246563341/?ref=bookmarks
